participant_1.background:
I like to draw and paint in my spare time.
My house is paid for.
I drive a four wheel drive vehicle.
My favorite color is blue.
I wear a uniform to work.

participant_2.background:
My dad works at the mill and my mom is a teacher.
I live in a house.
I have a lot of friends.
I love dogs and cats.

content.text: What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to draw and paint. I also like to play video games and go for walks.
That sounds like fun! I love to draw and paint too. What kind of things do you like to draw?
I like to draw animals and landscapes. I also like to draw imaginary creatures.
That's cool! I like to draw people and animals. I also like to draw cartoons.
I love cartoons! I used to watch a lot of cartoons when I was younger.
Me too! I still watch cartoons sometimes.
I don't have a favorite cartoon, but I like a lot of them. I like Adventure Time, Gravity Falls, and Steven Universe.
Those are all great cartoons! I love Adventure Time and Steven Universe.
Me too! I'm so excited for the next season of Adventure Time.
Me too! I'm also excited for the next season of Steven Universe.
I'm sure they'll both be great!
